mapper.select:
select review_id as reviewId, review_grade as reviewGrade, review_img as reviewImg, review_contents as reviewContents, review_created_date as reviewCreatedDate, product_id as productId, m.account_id as accountId
from review as r inner join member as m on r.member_id = m.member_id
order by reviewId desc
limit #{firstRecordIndex}, #{criteria.recordsPerPage}
